group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:explosion]…! Raaagh!!

group_1.textRight: Ah…![chara:770081:effect_shake]
Phew… *pant*…@Oh, that was a close one…

group_1.textLeft: *pant*… Phew…

group_1.textRight: Um, how is it now…?@Was that enough to let some steam off of you…?

group_1.textLeft: …Yeah.
Thanks to you, I feel a bit better now.@Sorry you have to keep me company so often.

group_1.textRight: Please don’t worry about it,@the pleasure is all mine.

group_1.textLeft: …Say, why dontcha talk to me in,@like, a more casual way?
I mean, at school you’re my senior,@so this feels kinda awkward…

group_1.textRight: Eh? I don’t mind, but…@would that not make you angry?

group_1.textLeft: Why’d I be angry when I’m the one@who suggested it?

group_1.textRight: Welp, guess I’ll just do as I’m told then…@something like this?
Not gonna lie, I’m kind of confused by your@sudden request for me to talk in a casual way.

group_1.textCenter: (Well, so it ain’t her language that's causing@this hazy feeling.)
(Even fighting can’t take the weight off now.@What exactly is this strange, naggin’ discomfort…?)
(Wasn’t it all good when I was venting@by hunting Kyubey…?)

group_1.textLeft: …Nah, that's weird to talk about too.

group_1.textRight: Um, I know this is a bit of a personal question,@but…

group_1.textLeft: Huh?@What, now that’s a change.

group_1.textRight: Why are you in this school, Juri…?
Like, isn’t it because of this kind of school culture,@that you struggle with not fitting in…?
When you reached high school, you could’ve@considered applying to other schools, I think…?

group_1.textLeft: Well, since I managed to get into this school,@I’m sure I could've gotten into others too…

group_1.textRight: Mhm…

group_1.textLeft: It just ain't that simple,@‘cause it’s the place I clung to with my wish.

group_1.textRight: Ohh, you mean…@I-I’m sorry, I didn’t know…!

group_1.textLeft: No, it‘s me who should be apologizing,@y’know?!
It’s got somethin’ to do with how you’ve been@asked to keep me company like this…

group_1.textRight: You’re saying that your wish and@this stress release thing…?

group_1.textLeft: That’s right.
My bad behaviour in the past was@a burden to my old man.
To change that, I worked my ass off,@and got into this school.
But ‘cause I’d defeated the enemy of exams,@I got irritated as soon as school started.
There’s a time when my true colours@began showing.
And, when it looked like I was gonna be kicked@outta school the next time I got into trouble,
I wished to Kyubey for “a patient, stout heart”.

group_1.textRight: So, the result of that was…

group_1.textLeft: Right, this whole mess you got involved in.
I can be patient now, but that doesn’t mean@my anger’s just gonna go away.
They turn into flames that build up,@and I explode when it reaches the limit.
That's the reason why I'm clinging to this school,@and why I'm giving you all this hassle.
All because I didn't wanna worry@my family anymore,
after making my bloody selfish wish.
So, I’m sorry, really.

group_1.textRight: That’s okay, I think.

group_1.textLeft: …Man, why the hell are you THIS devoted to me…

group_1.textRight: I like you.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102400:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Wha…?!
Uhh, wait, like…
I mean, this is an all-girls school,@and I’ve been confessed to before, but...

group_1.textRight: Oh, no, no, I mean, as a person…
While a bit rough, you’re also humane.@You’ve saved me.

group_1.textLeft: Huh, I have…?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, for a brief moment,@you saved me in a fight with a Witch.
A second later and I might've died...
You’re my life-saver, which is why I admire you@even though you’re from Ryuugasaki.
While I like the scenery presented by@Torayamachi’s Yuna very much,
I’d love to see the scenery created by@Ryuugasaki’s Juri, too.
That’s how much I like you.

group_1.textCenter: That’s why I decided to introduce her to you, Juri.

group_1.textRight: Yuna…!
I’m just here to check on you.

group_1.textLeft: …I finally got it now after hearing@what this girl said.
Thought it just ain’t like Yuna to go out of@her way to introduce people to me,
knowing that it’d put them in harm's way.

group_1.textRight: It was her own request, you know.
It’s just…
I somehow feel like you're not satisfied yet, Juri…?

group_1.textLeft: Wait, Yuna,@you’re offering to let me play with you now?

group_1.textRight: Only if you want me to.

group_1.textLeft: Goddamn, this “sickness” sure’s a pain in the ass.

group_1.textRight: Oh, you can imagine how hard it is@to look after that ass…
